Name: Marfusha
About the game: A high-tempo shooting game with simple controls! Become a guard of a dystopian world and defend the border gates from the enemies. Upgrade your character by buying cards with your heavily-taxed salary to face increasingly powerful enemies. -Cards for weapons, characters, power-ups, chance events, etc. -8 kinds of unique characters -Score attack ranking
